title: 'Another day, another cow(s)': Police in Georgia find cows on shooting range
body: POOLER, Ga. (WTGS)  — "Another day, another cow(s)!"The Pooler Police Department in Georgia found cows on their shooting range Tuesday, according to .Police said no cows, bulls, or officers were injured and all of them made it back home safely.Back in January, the Savannah Police Department  from the side of Interstate 16.Nearly a month later, Savannah Police rescued a  from an intersection.
